parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the electric power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become stiff, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The steering failure message appears on the instrument cluster

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of rear suspension components can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Rear of the vehicle begins vibrating
damage to rear suspension components (e.g. trailing arm lock nut

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature or False Activation of Pre-Sense System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature or false activation of the Pre-Sense system can cause sudden and unexpected braking, leading to potential accidents, loss of control, or rear-end collisions, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The Pre-Sense system displays a warning or applies the brakes unnecessarily
even when there is no apparent danger
potentially leading to loss of control or accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of advanced safety features, such as the rearview camera and Audi pre-sense system, can increase the risk of accidents or injuries, particularly when the system incorrectly activates or deactivates critical safety features.
symptoms: the "SOS System Deactivated" message is displayed
the Audi pre-sense warning light illuminates
and the front driver's side seat belt tightens around the waist.
